JAN 1 0 196$
Bell Telephone Laboratories
INCORPORATED
Murray Hill, New Jersey 07971
T ELEPHONE
Area Code 201
582-3000
January J, 1966
MR. RICHARD H. BELL
Executive Director
National Association of
Educational Broadcasters
13^6 Connecticut Avenue
Washington* D. C. 20036
Dear Mr. Bell:
Thank you for receipt of the annotated bibliography of ITV
research reports* enclosed with your letter of January 3> 1966.
These materials will constructively aid our interests in ETV
and CCTY studies. I look forward to the enlargement of
National Association of Educational Broadcasters services of
which you spoke and to learning further of the development
of NAEB membership for ITV industrial organizations.
Administrator
Education and Training Department
